choose.when: FID, FNAME, FCODE, FTYPE, FGROUP, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FORDER, FICON, FCONTENT, FINCLUDE_FILE, FTEMPLATE, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK

mapper.select:
select
from ect_widgets
order by
${item.field}
desc
mapper.delete: delete from ect_widgets where FID in (#{listItem})
mapper.insert: insert into ect_widgets (FID, FNAME, FCODE, FTYPE, FGROUP, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FORDER, FICON, FCONTENT, FINCLUDE_FILE, FTEMPLATE, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK ) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{group, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{includeFile, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{template, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update ect_widgets
FNAME = #{data.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCODE = #{data.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FTYPE = #{data.type, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FGROUP = #{data.group, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FENABLE = #{data.enable, jdbcType=BIT},
FAUDIT_STATE = #{data.auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},

FNAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where FID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

FNAME = #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCODE = #{code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FTYPE = #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FGROUP = #{group, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FENABLE = #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, FAUDIT_STATE = #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FDELETE_STATE = #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FEDIT_STATE = #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FORDER = #{order, jdbcType=INTEGER}, FICON = #{icon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTENT = #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, FINCLUDE_FILE = #{includeFile, jdbcType=CLOB}, FTEMPLATE = #{template, jdbcType=CLOB}, FAUDITOR_ID = #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATOR_ID = #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCREATE_TIME = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FDELETOR_ID = #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEDITOR_ID = #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEDIT_TIME = #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FREMARK = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
